body_html:
I have also tried every solution listed here, and the same issue persists

  • cuda 9.0 using "local install"
  • set PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH
  • library path in ld.so.conf.d and ran ldconfig
  • nvidia driver 390.87
  • installed opencv-python and np_utils

body:
I have also tried every solution listed here, and the same issue persists

- cuda 9.0 using "local install"
- set PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH
- library path in ld.so.conf.d and ran ldconfig
- nvidia driver 390.87
- installed opencv-python and np_utils
